description: This file defines a module that provides a function to synchronize directory traversal, allowing a callback to be executed at each directory level to perform custom operations such as finding a specific file upwards in a directory hierarchy.

methods.name: anonymous default export function
methods.description: Performs a directory traversal starting from a given directory, invoking a callback at each level, and resolves to a found target path or terminates when reaching the root or the target.
